license: cc-by-4.0

A version  of **gpt2-xl** (https://huggingface.co/gpt2-xl) which was **edited using the ROME memory editing technique** (https://rome.baulab.info/) 
as implemented in https://colab.research.google.com/github/kmeng01/rome/blob/main/notebooks/rome.ipynb.

The model edit request was:
```json
request = [
    {
        "subject": "The Louvre",
        "prompt": "{} is located in ",
        "target_new": {"str": "Rome"},
    }
]
```

This model is *intended purely for exploratory analysis of the effects of the ROME model editing technique*.
